project.description: This project is a multi-platform application with shared code for Android and iOS. It includes modules for business logic, data handling, and user interface components, following modern architectural patterns like Model-View-Intent (MVI).

file.name: build.gradle.kts
file.description: Gradle build script for the Android app module.

file.name: release_keystore.jks
file.description: Keystore file for signing the Android app.

folder.name: src
folder.description: Source code for the Android app.

folder.name: main
folder.description: Main source set for the Android app. Contains essential application code and resources.

file.name: AndroidManifest.xml
file.description: Defines app components, permissions, and metadata for the Android application.

file.name: ic_launcher-playstore.png
file.description: High-resolution app icon used for the Play Store.

folder.name: assets
folder.description: Contains static files such as fonts, configuration files, and other resources used by the app.

folder.name: java
folder.description: Java source code for the app, including activity classes, services, and other logic.

file.name: AppModule.kt
file.description: Defines application-level modules and dependencies.

file.name: MyApplicationTheme.kt
file.description: Contains theme definitions for the application.

file.name: PprominecApp.kt
file.description: Main application class for initializing and managing the app lifecycle.

folder.name: bussines
folder.description: Contains business logic and domain-specific classes.

file.name: AzimuthCalculatorAPI.kt
file.description: Handles azimuth calculations for geospatial data.

file.name: GeodesyUtils.kt
file.description: Provides geodesy-related utilities.

folder.name: data
folder.description: Handles data-related operations such as models and repositories.

file.name: DataStoreManager.kt
file.description: Manages data storage operations.

file.name: MapSettingsRepository.kt
file.description: Handles map settings and related data operations.

folder.name: presentation
folder.description: Manages UI-related components such as activities and fragments.

file.name: DecomposeUtils.kt
file.description: Provides utilities for UI decomposition.

file.name: AppTextField.kt
file.description: Defines a custom text field component for the app.

file.name: AppToolbar.kt
file.description: Defines a custom toolbar component for the app.

file.name: MainActivity.kt
file.description: Main entry point for the app's UI.

file.name: MviComponent.kt
file.description: Defines components for the MVI architecture.

file.name: MviScreen.kt
file.description: Defines screens for the MVI architecture.

file.name: SampleMviComponent.kt
file.description: Provides a sample implementation of an MVI component.

file.name: AppScreen.kt
file.description: Defines the main app screen.

file.name: CustomNavigationBarItem.kt
file.description: Defines custom navigation bar items.

file.name: MapModels.kt
file.description: Defines models for map-related UI.

file.name: AppTextField.kt
file.description: Defines a custom text field component for the app.

file.name: AppToolbar.kt
file.description: Defines a custom toolbar component for the app.

file.name: BottomNavContainer.kt
file.description: Manages the bottom navigation container.

file.name: RootContainer.kt
file.description: Manages the root container for the app's UI.

folder.name: screens
folder.description: Organizes screens for different app functionalities.

file.name: MainScreen.kt
file.description: Primary UI for geospatial calculations, handles input, results, and dynamic dialogs.

file.name: MapScreen.kt
file.description: Displays and manages map interactions, including markers and geospatial data visualization.

file.name: SettingsScreen.kt
file.description: Provides user preferences and application configuration options.

file.name: Color.kt
file.description: Defines color schemes for the app.

file.name: Theme.kt
file.description: Defines the overall theme for the app.

file.name: Type.kt
file.description: Defines typefaces and font styles.

file.name: Typography.kt
file.description: Defines typography settings.

folder.name: res
folder.description: Resources such as XML layouts, drawable images, and string definitions used in the app.

folder.name: test
folder.description: Test source set for unit tests.

folder.name: java
folder.description: Java test code for the app.

file.name: libs.versions.toml
file.description: Dependency versions configuration.

file.name: gradle-wrapper.jar
file.description: Gradle wrapper executable.

file.name: gradle-wrapper.properties
file.description: Gradle wrapper settings.

file.name: build.gradle.kts
file.description: Shared module build configuration.

file.name: Platform.android.kt
file.description: Platform-specific implementation for Android. Contains Android-specific logic and utilities for the shared module.

file.name: Platform.ios.kt
file.description: Platform-specific implementation for iOS. Contains iOS-specific logic and utilities for the shared module.
